body.section: This project provides widgets to build the user interface of a rich client. It abstracts from the underlying native toolkit and allows to build powerful and complex clients using a clean and well documented API that can be build as HTML5 web-client, native Swing client, etc. To get started have a look at our technical architecture and read the JavaDoc. mmm-client-ui-widget is separated into the technology neutral API and base-implementation as well as the technology specific implementations.
